nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats
Class StatisticalFinancesServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats.StatisticalServiceImpl
      nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats.StatisticalFinancesServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service, StatisticalFinancesService, StatisticalFinancesServiceLocal, StatisticalService, StatisticalServiceLocal
public class StatisticalFinancesServiceImpl
extends StatisticalServiceImpl
implements StatisticalFinancesServiceLocal

implementation of the StatisticalFinancesService.
This class is responsible of the gathering of the Finance Statistics. The calculations are delegated to the FinanceStatsSinglePeriod class.

Author:
Rinke
